Perforated Cable Trays & Accessories


Tee


Tee - perforated type Tee bend can be made in any degree as per requirement and it can be in any size from big to small, Small to big . Tee bend is being used to move cable trays horizontally to take another path.
Default Length - 2500mm
Finish - Pre-Galvanised as per IS-277, Powder Coated, Painted and Hot Dip Galvanised as per IS- 2629 and SS 202/304/316.
Height - 25mm,40mm, 75mm and 100mm.
Width - 40mm, 50mm, 75mm, 100mm, 150mm, 300mm, 600mm, 750mm and 1000mm.
Thickness - 1.2mm to 3mm

Ask for Quotation


Right/Left Reducer


Right / left hand reducer -

Perforated type cable trays

are primarily used in conjunction with perforated cable type trays to route the cable that is ideal for joining cable trays in the same plane with different widths. A right / left hand reducer - perforated form, has a straight side on the left when viewed from the wide end.
Default Length - 2500mm
Finish - Pre-Galvanised as per IS-277, Powder Coated, Painted and Hot Dip Galvanised as per IS- 2629 and SS 202/304/316.
Height - 25mm,40mm, 75mm and 100mm.
Width - 40mm, 50mm, 75mm, 100mm, 150mm, 300mm, 600mm, 750mm and 1000mm.
Thickness - 1.2mm to 3mm

Ask for Quotation


Vertical Outward Bend


Vertical outward bend - Perforated type are primarily used to route the cable where the path switches to a different plane in conjunction with perforated cable type trays. Vertical outward bend Shifts in direction downward from the Horizontal Plane of perforated form.
Default Length - 2500mm
Finish - Pre-Galvanised as per IS-277, Powder Coated, Painted and Hot Dip Galvanised as per IS- 2629 and SS 202/304/316.
Height - 25mm,40mm, 75mm and 100mm.
Width - 40mm, 50mm, 75mm, 100mm, 150mm, 300mm, 600mm, 750mm and 1000mm.
Thickness - 1.2mm to 3mm

Ask for Quotation


Perforated Cable Tray


The perforated type cable tray is suitable for installing large quantities of heavy duty power cables. Perforation provides maximum cable free air rating. At the same cross section, higher current flow can be achieved.Coupler holes in the side ensure fast attachment of cable trays to each other. Overheating and consecutive cable damage is avoided.
Default Length - 2500mm
Finish - Pre-Galvanised as per IS-277, Powder Coated, Painted and Hot Dip Galvanised as per IS- 2629 and SS 202/304/316.
Height - 25mm,40mm, 75mm and 100mm.
Width - 40mm, 50mm, 75mm, 100mm, 150mm, 300mm, 600mm, 750mm and 1000mm.
Thickness - 1.2mm to 3mm

Ask for Quotation


Vertical Inward Bend


Vertical Bend Inside - Perforated types are primarily used to route the cable where the path switches to a different plane in conjunction with perforated cable type trays. Vertical bend inside switches upward direction from the horizontal plane. Our product design helps the cable to properly route and bend edges to take care of the cable not to be worn out, peel off or get damage during cable layout.
Standard Length - 2500mm
Finish - Pre-Galvanised as per IS-277, Powder Coated, Painted and Hot Dip Galvanised as per IS- 2629 and SS 202/304/316.
Height - 25mm,40mm, 75mm and 100mm.
Width - 40mm, 50mm, 75mm, 100mm, 150mm, 300mm, 600mm, 750mm and 1000mm.
Thickness - 1.2mm to 3mm

Ask for Quotation


Horizontal Bend


Perforated type Horizontal Bend is primarily used in conjunction with perforated type of cable trays to route the cables in 90 degrees where two walls are connected. Our product design enables the cable to route properly and the bending edges take care of the cable not to be worn out.
Default Length - 2500mm
Finish - Pre-Galvanised as per IS-277, Powder Coated, Painted and Hot Dip Galvanised as per IS- 2629 and SS 202/304/316.
Height - 25mm,40mm, 75mm and 100mm.
Width - 40mm, 50mm, 75mm, 100mm, 150mm, 300mm, 600mm, 750mm and 1000mm.
Thickness - 1.2mm to 3mm

FAQ:

A: Classic Perforated cable trays are used for instrumentation, Control as well as Power Cables. Perforated Cable Trays provides excellent ventilation, it enhances life of cables and it can be fixed to any structure, We are well-known Manufacturer, Supplier, and Exporter of outstanding variety of Perforated Cable trays in Pune, India
A: Perforated cable tray is a kind of cable tray with holes on bottom sheet and side rails for laying power and signal cables for the purpose of distributing electricity, signaling in industrial plants, department stores, gyms, hospitals, airports and other industries. Compared with the channel cable tray, the perforated cable tray has holes on the bottom to help ventilate the cables.
A: It has a strong structure for carrying all types of cables. Perforated cable trays have holes on bottom to provide enough ventilation and position for cable lines.Anti-corrosion, fire, moisture due to the pre-galvanized, hot-dipped powder coated, epoxy coated finish Excellent heat dispersion. It is Safe and smooth edge protects cable lines from scratch.Strong enough to withstand short circuits. Flexible, easy and quick installation Available in various accessories to fix and install Easy to maintain Long life span.
